05390.mean:
1. below; under. 2. attitude particle used in exclamations or non-self evidence, hearsay, rumour etc.

05395.mean:

05397.mean:
1. any upper garment placed on the alter during worship to represent the absentee (concerned person who happens to be absent) 2. symbol.

05398.mean:

05399.mean:

05400.mean:

१. शक्ति; सर्वशक्तिमत्ता । २. अग्नि; आगो ।

05401.mean:

05402.mean:
god or goddess of power/strmeanth.

शक्तिोक देवता वा देवी ।

05408.mean:

05409.mean:

बाजा घन्केको वा बजेको स्वर; बजाइ; घन्काइ; वादन ।

चन्चल(ल); चकचके; सगबगे ।

05495.mean:

05503.mean:

ढुङ्गाको ओदान वा चुह्लो ।
